newsitem.title: USA: StreamLogic in venture with Diana unit.
newsitem.headline: StreamLogic in venture with Diana unit.

text.p: StreamLogic Corp said Wednesday it formed an Internet joint venture with Sattel Communications LLC, a subsidiary of Diana Corp.
The new venture, SatLogic LLC, markets network communications services, along with related hardware and software to Internet service providers (ISP).
SatLogic's network will have a national multi-service Internet access platform, and will offer ISPs an alternative to traditional capital-intensive private network options, the company said.
